column1: # CardDemo Test Data Fixtures - Comprehensive financial test data with BigDecimal precision preservation
# Generated from legacy ASCII data sources with exact COBOL-to-Java field mapping per Section 6.2.6.6
# Supports comprehensive business logic testing including interest calculations and balance updates per Section 6.6.6.2
# Test data includes representative scenarios for performance testing under 200ms response time requirements per Section 6.6.1.3
# All financial amounts converted from COBOL COMP-3 packed decimal (cents) to PostgreSQL DECIMAL(12
# Date formats standardized to ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) for PostgreSQL DATE/TIMESTAMP compatibility
# String fields preserved with exact length constraints matching JPA entity validation annotations
# BCrypt password hashes for authentication testing with Spring Security
# Anonymized customer profiles with normalized address structure and FICO scoring
# Primary customer relationships supporting account ownership patterns
# Additional customers for comprehensive testing scenarios including edge cases
# Edge case customers for boundary condition testing
# Account records with BigDecimal financial precision and PostgreSQL DECIMAL(12
# Balance amounts converted from COBOL COMP-3 cents to decimal format with exact precision
# Additional accounts for comprehensive testing including high-value accounts
# High-value accounts for performance and stress testing
# Edge case accounts for boundary condition testing
# Credit card records with 16-digit card numbers
# Structured to support pagination testing with 7 cards per page as specified in Section 6.2.2.4
# Second page of cards (cards 8-14) for pagination testing
# Third page of cards (cards 15-21) for pagination testing
# Edge case cards for comprehensive testing
# Additional cards for boundary testing - expired and inactive cards
# Transaction records with exact BigDecimal financial amounts and comprehensive merchant data
